alert.note: Alert for Clay; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:08PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Randolph and northeastern Clay Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Corinth to near Lineville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lineville, Ashland, Wedowee, Lake Wedowee, Woodland, Malone, Morrison Cross Roads, Barfield, Fosters Cross Roads, Delta, Crystal Lake, Corinth, Graham, Newell, Cragford, R.L. Harris Dam, Ofelia, Napoleon, Tennant and Big Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for east central Alabama.
